Notes: Description field shows type of discrimination that EEOC had alleged.

Description: EchoStar agreed to pay $5 million to settle multistate litigation file in response to hundreds of customer complaints about practices such as assessing a $240 cancellation fee that had not been disclosed when customers signed up for Dish Network.
